content: Working with Zach at Code Mentor was an excellent experience. He possesses a deep understanding of web development and explains complex concepts clearly and efficiently. Zach is not only knowledgeable but also patient and genuinely invested in my learning and success. His guidance was invaluable, and I highly recommend him to anyone seeking to improve their web development skills. Thanks to Zach, I now feel more confident and capable in my coding abilities.
Zack is nice and very patient. He helped me with debugging very effectively. I am planning to keep learning with him. Go go Zack!

Zack was fast, fun and completely professional. Definitely will be working with him again. Very refreshing to work with someone who understands the scope of the job and what's necessary to pull it off.
Great guy, super helpful. Defo recommend
Good guy, easy to chat with
Thanks, I will definitely work with Zack again!
Zack is great!
best person on this app and really helpful and very efficient and upbeat happy guy 100% recommend would leave 6 stars if i could
This guy solved in 2 minutes what i had been killing myself over 24 hours
Thanks for helping on such a complicated case.
Zack to the rescue once again. Great ability to quickly understand an issue and develop solutions.
Zack is super knowledgeable and very generous with his time, despite my incompetence!
Zack was very helpful despite my incompetence in the task at which he was helping! Very responsive as well.
Great help. a great debugging session with HTML .
With Zack's help I was able to speed up my knowledge in Vue.js. he is a very nice person, Thank you Zack!
Takes the time to listen to your needs throughout the session rather than brute force teaching a concept. Adaptable, intelligent, great communication skills. Highly recommend.
This guy is a literal python god, he helped resolve a problem I was stuck on for long time.
Smart, helpful and straight to the point. Highly recommend.

Zach helped me with a complex Fetch API/Django problem, quickly read understood my code, pausing the timer when code showed errors to try and keep it within my time limit, then directed me toward further reading and learning. Thank you for your help and guidance. I will reflect back on this learning experience often.

I find  Zack very good as a codementor.  In my case he showed interest in understanding what I wanted to do and so I was able to learn more and achieve my goal with my project.
Of course I recommend him, Thanks Zack!
Zack was wonderful, he was able to explain step by step what he was doing. Great communication!
good chat, nice guy
Very knowledgable and a great help!
Zack is an amazing mentor. He is knowledgeable, friendly and professional. I will definitely  be reaching out to Zack again for more mentor sessions.
Zack was extremely helpful on my project. He didn't hesitate to go above and beyond to help me out.
Zach is THE genius of all coding! Quick, efficient, and innovative. Highly recommend!
Zack analysed the code and found the issue very quickly. Also, he polished the code a bit :)
Zack was super nice, and walk me trough my request pretty fast!!
great session, awesome knowledge of the coding.  I hope to be there one day.
Zack was great to work with!
Zack was great, he was super friendly and helped me solve my issue step by step. Very knowledgeable!

Zack has helped me again to move forward in my journey to learn Python. I was stuck on som really confusing software issues, but Zack resolved them quickly. It was incredibly handy to be able to ask for Zack's help.

Thanks to Zack I was able to solve a really starnge and unusual problem relating to intalling a software. I do not think I would have solved it without Zack's help. Thanks to his help I will now be able to avoid the same problem going forward.
He was very quick to understand the problem, explain it to me as he is solving it, and provide the correct code to solve my coding problem. Highly recommended!

Zack was great to work with. He was quick at communicating and understood the issue I was experiencing quickly. 

After looking at my code for a few minutes he already saw what was wrong with the code and implemented a fix straight away. 

He also took his time to explain how everything worked! I'd recommend him for anyone who's looking to get help with there code.
Zack was fantastic. He jumped right in, stayed with me, and worked through the tough challenge in javascript that I was working on even on a platform that he was not entirely familiar with.
Great help. Quick to diagnose task and offer solution
Zack provided excellent perspective and I highly recommend him.
Zack quickly understoold my challenge, provided guidance to resolve my code bugs pointers to additional useful resources.
Zack was a savior! He instantly went online for me and helped me with an assignment that 2 other tutors couldn't figure out. He is totally worth it
Thank you Zack!
Great service here. Very personable and will leave you better off than when you started.
Zack was super fun to talk to.
Zack is awesome! He's friendly, fun to work with, knowledgable, and works quickly to help me through issues. Thanks!
Amazing was able to dig into my crazy app and help me sort everything out really quickly. Zach will be my new goto!
Zack was quick to understand my challenge and helped me to come up with a solution. Very efficient!
Top help, saved my week, Zack :-) Any time again, well adapted solution to my level of understanding.
Zach to the rescue once again. Quickly resolved my issue and provided guidance.
Zach was great. Very helpful and got right into what I needed help with. Looking forward to future sessions with him.
Zack was really helpful and patient in identifying the elements and debugging the errors. I will strongly recommend to reach out to him for any help.
Very helpful and knowledgeable!  Not only helped me debug, but also taught me a few best-practice pointers along the way.
Zack's been a great help! Has been really quick in answering my enquiry and sort out the issue I had! Thanks!
Quickly identified the task and resolved. Always willing to help and go the extra mile.
Zack's dedication to problem solving is unmatched!! He is fantastic at identifying the problem and coming up with a solution
Zack is amazing and an absolute Django Guru!!

This was my first experience with Codementor, and Zach made it a great one! I just started learning Python and was working on a Django app. Zach helped me to quickly understand the structure, syntax and flow of how to build the app - and at lightning speed! I will definitely be asking Zach for more help on my app as I develop it. Thank you!
Great session. Zack is very patentient and answered all my questions.

Zack is amazing to work with to understand programming in a quick, helpful and friendly manner.  He is very patient and understanding and is a great tutor/teacher.  I highly recommend Zack's professional skills.
I needed help with Python and Pandas.  Zach is an expert in both.  I'm very satisfied.
It was great working with Zack again. I learnt a lot going through the debugging process with him and sorting out my issue. Thanks!
Zack is knowledgeable and helpful!

Extremely polite! But also excellent at debugging and explaining things. Clearly understood the expectations and broke down the problem in a very palatable way. Knowledgable in python, panda and compared it to JavaScript (to make it understandable to me, as I only know JS). Will message again if I have any queries at all.
Great, efficient session!  Was able to help tackle my obstacle, and explain in the process to help it stick.
Zack is absolutely amazing! If you've got a coding issue, Zack is the person you want to chat with! He is incredible!

Zack is a python God! Incredibly helpful, friendly, insightful and great at pinpointing and eliminating code efficiencies with great explanations on how to approach a situation and be a better coder. I highly recommend Zack for all of your coding needs!

Zack is fantastic at quickly determining where there are inefficiencies in a block of code and figuring a more efficient way of writing it. He communicated very well how and why changes can be made. Zack is a great code mentor and awesome at helping one to be a better coder!
Zack helped me quickly and was friendly while doing it. Didnt even make me feel dumb for not know what I was doing. Will def use him again.
We define how to manage multiple users and this was tough but we can find the right way to solve it and go to the next step. Thanks Zack
Very Good Mentor! I really love Zack. Want to meet you again.

Also in this session, Zack demonstrate that he can find great solutions, challenge 
never is too big for him, thanks a lot

zack helped me out with a Python challenge I was stuck at. I had no idea how to encounter it but he showed me the way and explained each step throughout the process. He even showed me different way to tackle the problem. I will be reaching out to him in the future.
Great, patient, explained things well and helped me with my issue quickly!
Very helpful- especially if you're a stressed student who is hopeless at coding :)
Hands Down worth every penny. Will use again for sure

We work in finding the best solution to an important Issue, Zack always help me find the more interesting way to create a clean code and save a lot line and time. Helping in developing the programmer mindset. Great!

STOP AND READ.

I had a very difficult and urgent project I needed to turn into work, with little budget, just the worse scenario to be in as a Jr. Dev. Zack was a complete heaven-send for me. He was not only knowledgeable, but he also cared. We don't even know each other, and he showed me tons of empathy and patience. Zack is a phenomenal guy and an even better mentor. I highly recommend him for your next project!

Zach is an enthusiast professional.
Well-spoken and fun to communicate with.
He managed to solve my issue much faster than I estimated.
He has the right mindset and an always-up-for-a-challenge attitude.
I'm definitely going to work with him in the future!
Always very useful in showing the best way of doing things..
Great job, worked patiently on 1:1 session.
Working with Zack is always a great experience, I learned a lot and he shows me a new and better way to make an effective code.
Very efficient and know exactly what to do! I'l definitely work with you again.
Great session with Zack. He quickly grasped the problem, provided a neat solution and helped educate me on the way.
Zack is incredible super helpful and personable will definitely use again in the future
Zack did a great job in helping me debug my code and also took the time to carefully explain all the steps. Highly recommend!
Zack crushed it! Very helpful and easy to work with.

I'm an advanced coder, but had a very specific issue of importing Python functions within a Class. Zack quickly understood what the issues were and we cleaned up the imports. Exactly what I was looking for.
The best code mentor I ever had.
Very helpful!
I had a really good experience.  Zack has helped me before and he was very skilled helping me troubleshoot my issues...
Great job. Thanks for the help as always.

Zack was awesome - I am a complete noob, but he went through all the basics for getting started with python/coding - including setting up my visual studio/python download and all that is involved with starting from complete scratch. I had a goal to scrape data from various files and we went through the process for making that code and it worked! - then went in depth on what some good resources are for someone starting from scratch. Overall great experience, Zack is professional with good resources (including a youtube page and discord channel for more learning resources). First time using codementor too, overall A+ experience.

I was lucky to find Zack.  He was skilled and efficient and was quick to troubleshoot my code and find the errors.  Professional the whole time, he walked me through best practices and spotted things it would have taken me days to uncover on my own.  He's a pro.  I would use his services again.
Super fast delivery, perfect service. He knows the way.
python expert with a great attitude he will do his absolute best to solve your tasks
He's very knowledge and he definitely knows what he talks about when he tells you something unlike others. I would recommend him anytime.

Zack is a great codementor. I am learning and very rough on Python but He was so polite and provide great advice every step of the way. He was determine to help me and he did. I recommend him if you need with Python or/and Django.
Zach was super kind and helpful and helped me write what I was trying to do. Highly recommend!
Explained the principles behind each way to apply styles to HTML files and also gave examples each time I had a question. Very informative!
Genius.
So incredibly helpful. He didn't know exactly how my code should work at first so he did some research super quickly and got me the perfect answer.

Zack was INCREDIBLE. He honestly is the best thing for this site. Please use him, you will not regret it at all. He is excellent and a great tutor. He can break it down if you ask him to, he allows you to try and understand in your own terms. He is an excellent, excellent tutor/teacher/mentor. PLEASE PICK HIM IF HE's AVAILABLE.
Zack is a great teacher! I learned tons about writing more efficient code, signals in Django, and project structure. Thank you!

Zach was super helpful in breaking down my project and helping me understand what next steps were required. He gave me a lot of great advice and pointed me to the resources that I needed. I am happy having received his help.

Zack, what can I say - absolutely perfect and a stellar delivery. He's friendly, coordinated, patient, intuitive and went above and beyond to solve my issue, this guy is exactly what I expected and wanted from Codementor! I commend his experience in Python and ability to unravel and solve any puzzle presented to him. Highly recommended, thanks again chap!
Zack was very helpful and friendly in showing me some issues with my code as well as some new tricks to make development easier!
Helped to quickly solve the issue, great knowledge of django and python.
Excellent Mentor. Zack has very good communication skills and he is extremely patient. I highly recommend him.
Helped me push my changes to Heroku and reset my entire database there. Also helped me set the queryset on drop down menu inputs.
Helped me refactor my entire project so that it follows standards and is understandable, implement search functionality on my website, and use data from an outside source.
Taught me the Python standard naming conventions and how to add user-specific features on my website.
Updated authentication for accessing GitHub with new security updates

Zack is very responsive and takes the project to the next level making it easier to edit long term.

This is the 3rd time I have used Zack k- he is clearly my go to.
Zack was very knowledgeable and helped me resolve my issue. Highly recommend using Zach for your debugging needs.
Zack figured out how to use selenium on Heroku and we're one step ahead towards our goal!
Zack is amazing! He managed to turn my idea into reality with ease. ;)
Zack is really understanding and nice, he is patient in helping me to solve the errors and explain to me the codes throughout! Highly recommend him
Zack is great! He made my idea turn into reality and guided me along the way! Thanks!
Walked through the process and sent me stack overflow links for reference
Zack is great! He built the entire Django app for me and guided me through each step!
explained things clearly and also asked me questions throughout to make sure I understand!
Zack was responsive and innovative with this approach. It was an absolute pleasure working with him.
Zack is not only good at coding but also coaching. Highly recommended for beginners!
Zack is wonderful. He understands my request quickly and comes up with solution almost instantly. Thanks!
Zack is perfect. Solved my problem in 5 min.
Zack helped me out a great deal and has great knowledge. Recommended!
Extremely helpful and very clear in his teaching.
Super helpful! Was very thorough and continuously checked if I had any questions.
